message: Good morning! I'm here to assist you. If you don't mind, could you tell me your gender? This helps me provide more personalized advice.(1/5)
Could you share your age with me? Knowing your age will help me suggest exercises that are just right for you.(2/5)
I'm curious about your current exercise routine. How often do you get to move and stretch? This will help me understand your activity level.(3/5)
Do you have any health conditions or physical restrictions? Please share only what you're comfortable withâ€”it'll help me make sure we only do what's best for you.(4/5)
What are your wellness goals? I can offer support whether you're looking to improve your strength, flexibility, balance, or something else!(5/5)
